MyOs based on Contiki-Os concepts for memory constrained microcontrollers.

37 #define debounce_timer hold_timer
38 
39 #define UIBUTTONS_TRANSITION_PRESSED() (button->prev_state == UIBUTTONS_STATE_RELEASED && curr_state == UIBUTTONS_STATE_PRESSED)
40 #define UIBUTTONS_TRANSITION_RELEASED() (button->prev_state == UIBUTTONS_STATE_PRESSED && curr_state == UIBUTTONS_STATE_RELEASED)
41 #define UIBUTTONS_TRANSITION_HELD() (button->prev_state == UIBUTTONS_STATE_PRESSED && curr_state == UIBUTTONS_STATE_PRESSED)
42 
43 
44 #define UIBUTTONS_DEBOUNCING() (button->prev_state >= UIBUTTONS_STATE_RELEASED_DEBOUNCE)
45 
46 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_EDGES
47 extern void uibuttons_fire_rising_edge(uibutton_t *button);
48 extern void uibuttons_fire_falling_edge(uibutton_t *button);
49 #endif
50 
51 #if (UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_SINGLE_PRESS || UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_LONG_PRESS)
52 extern void uibuttons_fire_short_press(uibutton_t *button);
53 #endif
54 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_LONG_PRESS
55 extern void uibuttons_fire_long_press(uibutton_t *button);
56 extern void uibuttons_fire_longer_press(uibutton_t *button);
57 extern void uibuttons_fire_longest_press(uibutton_t *button);
58 extern void uibuttons_fire_long_release(uibutton_t *button);
59 extern void uibuttons_fire_longer_release(uibutton_t *button);
60 extern void uibuttons_fire_longest_release(uibutton_t *button);
61 #endif
62 
63 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_REPEAT_PRESS
64 extern void uibuttons_fire_repeat_press(uibutton_t *button);
65 #endif
66 
67 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_MULTI_CLICK
68 extern void uibuttons_fire_single_click(uibutton_t *button);
69 extern void uibuttons_fire_double_click(uibutton_t *button);
70 extern void uibuttons_fire_triple_click(uibutton_t *button);
71 #endif
72 
130 void uibuttons_poll(uibutton_t *button)
131 {
132  bool curr_state;
133  curr_state = button->get();
134 
135 
136  /* DEBOUNCING */
137  /* --------------------------------------------------------------------*/
138 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_DEBOUNCING
139 
140  if(UIBUTTONS_TRANSITION_PRESSED())
141  {
142  button->prev_state = UIBUTTONS_STATE_PRESSED_DEBOUNCE;
143  button->debounce_timer = UIBUTTONS_DEBOUNCE_COUNT;
144  }
145  else if(UIBUTTONS_TRANSITION_RELEASED())
146  {
147  button->prev_state = UIBUTTONS_STATE_RELEASED_DEBOUNCE;
148  button->debounce_timer = UIBUTTONS_DEBOUNCE_COUNT;
149  }
150 
151 
152  if(button->prev_state == UIBUTTONS_STATE_PRESSED_DEBOUNCE)
153  {
154  if(curr_state == UIBUTTONS_STATE_PRESSED)
155  {
156  if( button->debounce_timer != 0 )
157  {
158  button->debounce_timer--;
159  return;
160  }
161  else
162  {
163  button->prev_state = UIBUTTONS_STATE_RELEASED;
164  }
165  }
166  else
167  {
168  button->prev_state = UIBUTTONS_STATE_RELEASED;
169  return;
170  }
171  }
172  else if(button->prev_state == UIBUTTONS_STATE_RELEASED_DEBOUNCE)
173  {
174  if(curr_state == UIBUTTONS_STATE_RELEASED)
175  {
176  if( button->debounce_timer != 0 )
177  {
178  button->debounce_timer--;
179  return;
180  }
181  else
182  {
183  button->prev_state = UIBUTTONS_STATE_PRESSED;
184  }
185  }
186  else
187  {
188  button->prev_state = UIBUTTONS_STATE_PRESSED;
189  return;
190  }
191  }
192 #endif
193 
194 
195  /* BUTTON HANDLING*/
196  /* --------------------------------------------------------------------*/
197 
198  if(UIBUTTONS_TRANSITION_PRESSED())
199  {
200 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_MULTI_CLICK
201  button->click_timer = UIBUTTONS_CLICK_TIMEOUT;
202 #endif
203 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_EDGES
204  uibuttons_fire_rising_edge(button);
205 #endif
206 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_LONG_PRESS
207  button->hold_timer = 0;
208 #endif
209 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_REPEAT_PRESS
210  uibuttons_fire_repeat_press(button);
211  button->repeat_timer = UIBUTTONS_REPEAT_DELAY;
212 #endif
213  }
214 
215  if (UIBUTTONS_TRANSITION_HELD())
216  {
217 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_MULTI_CLICK
218  button->click_timer = UIBUTTONS_CLICK_TIMEOUT;
219 #endif
220 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_LONG_PRESS
221  if (button->hold_timer != UINT8_MAX) button->hold_timer++;
222 #endif
223 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_REPEAT_PRESS
224  if(!--button->repeat_timer)
225  {
226  uibuttons_fire_repeat_press(button);
227  button->repeat_timer = UIBUTTONS_REPEAT_RATE;
228  }
229 #endif
230 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_LONG_PRESS
231  switch(button->hold_timer)
232  {
233  case UIBUTTONS_LONG_PRESS_TIMEOUT:
234  uibuttons_fire_long_press(button);
235  break;
236  case UIBUTTONS_LONGER_PRESS_TIMEOUT:
237  uibuttons_fire_longer_press(button);
238  break;
239  case UIBUTTONS_LONGEST_PRESS_TIMEOUT:
240  uibuttons_fire_longest_press(button);
241  break;
242  }
243 #endif
244  }
245 
246 
247  if(UIBUTTONS_TRANSITION_RELEASED())
248  {
249 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_MULTI_CLICK
250  button->click_timer = UIBUTTONS_CLICK_TIMEOUT;
251  button->click_count++;
252 #endif
253 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_EDGES
254  uibuttons_fire_falling_edge(button);
255 #endif
256 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_LONG_PRESS
257  if (button->hold_timer < UIBUTTONS_LONG_PRESS_TIMEOUT)
258  {
259  uibuttons_fire_short_press(button);
260  }
261  else if (button->hold_timer < UIBUTTONS_LONGER_PRESS_TIMEOUT)
262  {
263  uibuttons_fire_long_release(button);
264  }
265  else if (button->hold_timer < UIBUTTONS_LONGEST_PRESS_TIMEOUT)
266  {
267  uibuttons_fire_longer_release(button);
268  }
269  else
270  {
271  uibuttons_fire_longest_release(button);
272  }
273 #else
274 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_SINGLE_PRESS
275  uibuttons_fire_short_press(button);
276 #endif
277 #endif
278  }
279 
280 #if UIBUTTONS_ENABLE_MULTI_CLICK
281  if(button->click_timer)
282  {
283  button->click_timer--;
284  }
285  else
286  {
287  switch(button->click_count)
288  {
289  case 0:
290  break;
291  case 1:
292  uibuttons_fire_single_click(button);
293  break;
294  case 2:
295  uibuttons_fire_double_click(button);
296  break;
297  default:
298  uibuttons_fire_triple_click(button);
299  break;
300  }
301  button->click_count = 0;
302  }
303 #endif
304 
305  button->prev_state = curr_state;
306 }
